title: Stock Picks: Lessons From Veeva, Nvidia, Netflix On How To Find The Best Stocks To Buy

text:
As the coronavirus stock market recovery continues, now is the time to find the best stocks to buy and watch. But with thousands of publicly traded companies to choose from, finding the best stocks is no easy task. By following a simple buying checklist and regularly checking IBD's S&P 500-beating screens can help you put the best potential stock picks on your watch list.

X

The goal is to identify potential winning stocks like Apple (AAPL), ServiceNow (NOW), Veeva Systems (VEEV), and so-called FANG stocks Facebook (FB), Amazon (AMZN), Netflix (NFLX) and Google parent Alphabet (GOOGL) in the early stages of a big move.

The company names will change over time and stock market cycles, but the traits of winning stocks you look for remain the same. As you'll see below, the most effective way to zero in on the best stocks to buy and watch is to focus on those with exceptional earnings growth that are breaking out of a chart pattern during a strong market uptrend. You can streamline that stock-picking process by using a simple three-step routine.

And now is the perfect time to update your list of stocks to watch. Regularly use lists like IBD Long-Term Leaders, Sector Leaders and the IBD 50 to zero on potential stock picks.

Be sure to also have sound rules for when to sell stocks since even the best stocks eventually falter, especially when the general market comes under pressure. The bear market of last year and the current downtrend are clear evidence of that.

Coronavirus Stock Market Survival Guide

Stock Picks: Focus On Strong Earnings Growth

Through a groundbreaking study of 100-plus years of market history, IBD identified seven common traits of winning stocks, with earnings growth being the most critical factor.

Over the last decade, the market's biggest winners confirm that finding. Top performers like AAPL, NVDA, FB and NFLX all showed explosive, even triple-digit, earnings growth as their share prices rose dramatically.

So as you go through a buying check list to evaluate your potential stock picks, look for companies posting 25% or higher earnings growth.

Be sure to also use IBD Stock Checkup to check your stock's EPS Rating. You'll instantly see if the stock earnings a pass or fail grade for its quarterly and annual earnings growth.

Tips On Evaluating Earnings Growth

Stock Picks: Look For Breakouts From Chart Patterns

Just because a company has stellar earnings doesn't mean it's a good time to buy its stock. Several other factors come into play, including the market trend and the chart action. You can significantly improve the performance of your stock picks — and reduce your risk — if you make sure the chart and the market are giving you the green light to buy.

Chart patterns serve as a launchpad for a stock's new climb. Also known as bases or consolidations, these patterns form after a stock has already climbed and is now taking a breather to hopefully set up a new run. The ideal time to buy a stock is when it completes that base and proves its strength by punching through a point of resistance in heavy volume.

The most profitable and common chart patterns to look for are the cup with handle, double bottom and flat base. Once you identify companies with strong earnings that are also forming one of these three patterns, you'll be well on your way to catching the best stocks to buy and watch.

Winning moves from Apple, Amazon, ServiceNow, Nvidia, Netflix and countless others in just the last few years proves this point. Virtually all of the market's biggest winners form one or all three of these patterns as they make their big climbs. See the chart below for how Nvidia stock launched what became a 750% gain over the next 29 months. Nvidia has since corrected sharply, as even the best growth stocks eventually do. That serves as a reminder of why investors also need to follow proven sell rules.

Veeva stock is another example. The medical software company rose 531% from a May 2016 cup-with-handle breakout through July 19, 2019. It was featured in the IBD 50 list of top growth stocks before it launched that move. The medical software stock has continued higher from there and is now once again trading right around new all-time highs.

Tips On How To Read Stock Charts

Stock Picks: Where To Find The Best Stocks To Buy And Watch

To help streamline your research, IBD provides a collection of S&P 500-beating lists, including the IBD 50, Sector Leaders and the IBD Big Cap 20. These screens are computer-generated, based on proven criteria rather than opinions.

The criteria comes from our extensive study of over 100 years of market history in which we identified the common characteristics winning stocks share in the early stages of a big move. With these screens, we highlight today's stocks that are most strongly showing those same telltale traits.

While you should never buy a stock just because it's on one of IBD's screens, these lists are an excellent starting point for building a high-quality, actionable watch list.

Be sure to regularly check IBD Stock Lists Update to see which companies just came on and off IBD's top screens.

<article class="clearfix post-3831855 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-research tag-evergreen tag-how-to-invest-buying-stocks tag-how-to-invest-ibd-smartselect-stock-ratings tag-how-to-invest-stock-research prim_stock_symbol-aapl prim_stock_symbol-amzn prim_stock_symbol-nflx prim_stock_symbol-nvda prim_stock_symbol-veev article_type-staffarticle distribution_rights-distribute">
<header>
<ul class="post-categories">
<li><a href="https://www.investors.com/category/research/" rel="category tag">Research</a></li></ul> <h1 class="header1">
Stock Picks: Lessons From Veeva, Nvidia, Netflix On How To Find The Best Stocks To Buy	</h1>
<div class="featured-post-image-container"></div>
<div class="addtoany_share_save_container addtoany_content_top row">
<div class="share">
<div class="a2a_kit a2a_kit_size_25 addtoany_list" data-a2a-url="https://www.investors.com/research/stock-picks-best-stocks-to-buy-and-watch/" data-a2a-title="Stock Picks: Lessons From Veeva, Nvidia, Netflix On How To Find The Best Stocks To Buy"><a class="a2a_button_facebook" href="https://www.addtoany.com/add_to/facebook?linkurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investors.com%2Fresearch%2Fstock-picks-best-stocks-to-buy-and-watch%2F&linkname=Stock%20Picks%3A%20Lessons%20From%20Veeva%2C%20Nvidia%2C%20Netflix%20On%20How%20To%20Find%20The%20Best%20Stocks%20To%20Buy" title="Facebook" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/facebook.png" width="25" height="25" alt="Facebook"></a><a class="a2a_button_twitter" href="https://www.addtoany.com/add_to/twitter?linkurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investors.com%2Fresearch%2Fstock-picks-best-stocks-to-buy-and-watch%2F&linkname=Stock%20Picks%3A%20Lessons%20From%20Veeva%2C%20Nvidia%2C%20Netflix%20On%20How%20To%20Find%20The%20Best%20Stocks%20To%20Buy" title="Twitter" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/twitter.png" width="25" height="25" alt="Twitter"></a><a class="a2a_button_linkedin" href="https://www.addtoany.com/add_to/linkedin?linkurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investors.com%2Fresearch%2Fstock-picks-best-stocks-to-buy-and-watch%2F&linkname=Stock%20Picks%3A%20Lessons%20From%20Veeva%2C%20Nvidia%2C%20Netflix%20On%20How%20To%20Find%20The%20Best%20Stocks%20To%20Buy" title="LinkedIn" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/linkedin.png" width="25" height="25" alt="LinkedIn"></a><a class="a2a_dd addtoany_share_save addtoany_share" href="https://www.addtoany.com/share"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/email.png" alt="Share"></a></div> <a class="reprints-button sharing" href="https://www.ibdlicensing.com" target="_blank">Licensing</a>
</div>
<ul class="post-meta">
<li><span class="authors-links"><a href="https://www.investors.com/author/galganim/" title="Posts by MATTHEW GALGANI" class="author url fn" rel="author">MATTHEW GALGANI</a></span></li>
<li class="post-time">02:40 PM ET 06/02/2020</li>
</ul>
</div>
</header>
<div class="single-post-content post-content drop-cap">
<p>As the <a href="https://www.investors.com/research/coronavirus-stock-market-crash-survival-guide/">coronavirus stock market recovery</a> continues, now is the time to find the best stocks to buy and watch. But with thousands of publicly traded companies to choose from, finding the best stocks is no easy task. By following a simple <a href="https://www.investors.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/IBD_BuyingChecklist.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener">buying checklist</a> and regularly checking IBD's <a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/sp500-beating-lists-find-next-apple-amazon/">S&P 500-beating screens</a> can help you put the best potential stock picks on your watch list.</p>
<span>
<span style="width:50%;" class="video-player-container vms-left">
<span class="shortcode-video" vid-id="4864917" vid-dom-id="4864917-5ed70b880d265" vid-top="false" vid-repeat="1" vid-width="50" vid-url="https://content.jwplatform.com/manifests/3v34WeVR.m3u8" data-captions="" vid-name="IBD Stock Of The Day: Find Top Stocks To Buy And Watch" vid-cat="Learn How To Trade Stocks Using Research Tools" vid-date="08/13/2019" vid-image="https://www.investors.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/3v34WeVR-640x360.jpg" vid-authors="MATTHEW GALGANI">
<span class="close-mini-vid">X</span>
<span id="shortcode-video-player-4864917-5ed70b880d265" class="ready-to-load"></span>
</span>
</span>
</span><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https:\/\/schema.org","@type":"VideoObject","name":"IBD Stock Of The Day: Find Top Stocks To Buy And Watch","description":"Looking for the best stocks to buy and watch? Start by checking the IBD Stock Of The Day to get timely analysis of highly rated stocks and any potential buy points.","thumbnailUrl":"https:\/\/www.investors.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/08\/3v34WeVR-640x360.jpg","contentUrl":"https:\/\/content.jwplatform.com\/manifests\/3v34WeVR.m3u8","uploadDate":"2019-08-13T14:36:26+0000","duration":"PT64.41S","author":"MATTHEW GALGANI","publisher":{"@type":"Organization","name":"Investor's Business Daily","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https:\/\/www.investors.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2020\/06\/ibd-logo.png"},"url":"https:\/\/www.investors.com"},"keywords":""}</script>
<p>The goal is to identify potential winning stocks like <strong>Apple</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=AAPL' target='_blank'>AAPL</a>), <strong>ServiceNow</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=NOW' target='_blank'>NOW</a>), <strong>Veeva Systems</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=VEEV' target='_blank'>VEEV</a>), and so-called <a href="https://www.investors.com/news/technology/fang-stocks-news-quotes-facebook-amazon-netflix-google/">FANG stocks</a> <strong>Facebook</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=FB' target='_blank'>FB</a>), <strong>Amazon</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=AMZN' target='_blank'>AMZN</a>), <strong>Netflix</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=NFLX' target='_blank'>NFLX</a>) and Google parent <strong>Alphabet</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=GOOGL' target='_blank'>GOOGL</a>) in the <em>early</em> stages of a big move.</p>
<p>The company names will change over time and stock market cycles, but the <a href="https://www.investors.com/ibd-university/can-slim/">traits of winning stocks</a> you look for remain the same. As you'll see below, the most effective way to zero in on the <a href="https://www.investors.com/stock-lists/stocks-to-watch-top-rated-ipos-big-caps-and-growth-stocks/">best stocks to buy and watch</a> is to focus on those with exceptional earnings growth that are breaking out of a <a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/chart-reading-for-beginners-chart-patterns-cup-with-handle-double-bottom-flat-base/">chart pattern</a> during a <a href="https://www.investors.com/ibd-videos/?cvid=2385970">strong market uptrend</a>. You can streamline that stock-picking process by using a <a href="https://www.investors.com/research/ibd-stock-analysis/how-to-invest-in-the-stock-market-start-with-a-simple-routine/">simple three-step routine</a>.</p>
<p>And now is the perfect time to update your list of <a href="https://www.investors.com/tag/coronavirus-stocks-to-watch/">stocks to watch</a>. Regularly use lists like <a href="https://www.investors.com/research/ibd-long-term-leaders-screen/">IBD Long-Term Leaders</a>, <a href="https://research.investors.com/stock-lists/sector-leaders">Sector Leaders</a> and the <a href="https://research.investors.com/stock-lists/ibd-50/">IBD 50</a> to zero on potential stock picks.</p>
<p>Be sure to also have sound rules for <a href="https://www.investors.com/ibd-university/how-to-sell/">when to sell stocks</a> since even the best stocks eventually falter, especially when the general market comes under pressure. The bear market of last year and the current downtrend are clear evidence of that.</p>
<hr />
<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="https://www.investors.com/research/coronavirus-stock-market-crash-survival-guide/">Coronavirus Stock Market Survival Guide</a></p>
<hr />
<h2>Stock Picks: Focus On Strong Earnings Growth</h2>
<p>Through a groundbreaking study of 100-plus years of market history, IBD identified <a href="https://www.investors.com/ibd-university/can-slim/">seven common traits of winning stocks</a>, with earnings growth being the most critical factor.</p>
<p>Over the last decade, the market's biggest winners confirm that finding. Top performers like AAPL, NVDA, FB and NFLX all showed explosive, even triple-digit, earnings growth as their share prices rose dramatically.</p>
<p>So as you go through a <a href="https://www.investors.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/IBD_BuyingChecklist.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener">buying check list</a> to evaluate your potential stock picks, look for companies posting 25% or higher earnings growth.</p>
<p>Be sure to also use <a href="https://research.investors.com/stock-checkup/">IBD Stock Checkup</a> to check your stock's EPS Rating. You'll instantly see if the stock earnings a pass or fail grade for its quarterly and annual earnings growth.</p>
<p><em>Tips On Evaluating Earnings Growth</em></p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/earnings-per-share-growth-stocks/">Earnings Per Share: The Number One Influencer On Growth Stocks</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/how-to-use-the-eps-rating/">How To Use The EPS Rating To Evaluate Stocks</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/should-you-buy-stock-ahead-of-earnings/">Should You Buy A Stock Ahead Of Its Earnings Report?</a></li>
</ul>
<h2>Stock Picks: Look For Breakouts From Chart Patterns</h2>
<p>Just because a company has stellar earnings doesn't mean it's a good time to buy its stock. Several other factors come into play, including the <a href="https://www.investors.com/ibd-university/market-timing/">market trend</a> and the <a href="https://www.investors.com/ibd-university/chart-reading/">chart action</a>. You can significantly improve the performance of your stock picks — and reduce your risk — if you make sure the chart and the market are giving you the green light to buy.</p>
<p>Chart patterns serve as a launchpad for a stock's new climb. Also known as bases or consolidations, these patterns form after a stock has already climbed and is now taking a breather to hopefully set up a new run. The ideal time to buy a stock is when it completes that base and proves its strength by punching through a point of resistance in heavy volume.</p>
<p>The <a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/chart-reading-for-beginners-chart-patterns-cup-with-handle-double-bottom-flat-base/">most profitable and common chart patterns</a> to look for are the cup with handle, double bottom and flat base. Once you identify companies with strong earnings that are also forming one of these three patterns, you'll be well on your way to catching the best stocks to buy and watch.</p>
<p>Winning moves from Apple, Amazon, ServiceNow, Nvidia, Netflix and countless others in just the last few years proves this point. Virtually all of the market's biggest winners form one or all three of these patterns as they make their big climbs. See the chart below for how Nvidia stock launched what became a 750% gain over the next 29 months. Nvidia has since corrected sharply, as even the best growth stocks eventually do. That serves as a reminder of why investors also need to follow proven <a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/still-the-no-1-rule-for-stock-investors-always-cut-your-losses-short/">sell rules</a>.</p>
<p>Veeva stock is another example. The medical software company rose 531% from a May 2016 cup-with-handle breakout through July 19, 2019. It was featured in the <a href="https://research.investors.com/stock-lists/ibd-50/">IBD 50 list of top growth stocks</a> before it launched that move. The medical software stock has continued higher from there and is now once again trading right around new all-time highs.</p>
<div class="small-12 columns "><div class='ibd-chart-container' style='position:relative;width:100%;height:462px;overflow:hidden;'><iframe class='ibd-chart-frame' style='position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:99.9%;height:100%;' frameborder='0' src='https://research.investors.com/ibdchartswp.aspx?cht=pvc&type=weekly&symbol=VEEV'></iframe></div></div>
<p><em>Tips On How To Read Stock Charts</em></p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/stock-chart-reading-for-beginners/">Why Use Charts? What's In A Stock Chart?</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/stock-chart-reading-for-beginners-trend-moving-averages-support-nvidia-netflix/">3 Telltale Clues To Look For In A Stock Chart</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.investors.com/ibd-university/how-to-buy/">When's The Best Time To Buy Stocks?</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-3514428" src="https://www.investors.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/BasicsThreeNVDA62918-885x1024.jpg" alt="" width="885" height="1024" srcset="https://www.investors.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/BasicsThreeNVDA62918-885x1024.jpg 885w, https://www.investors.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/BasicsThreeNVDA62918-259x300.jpg 259w, https://www.investors.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/BasicsThreeNVDA62918-768x889.jpg 768w, https://www.investors.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/BasicsThreeNVDA62918.jpg 1063w" sizes="(max-width: 885px) 100vw, 885px" /></p>
<h2>Stock Picks: Where To Find The Best Stocks To Buy And Watch</h2>
<p>To help streamline your research, IBD provides a collection of <a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/looking-for-the-best-stocks-to-buy-and-watch-start-here/">S&P 500-beating lists</a>, including the IBD 50, Sector Leaders and the <a href="https://research.investors.com/stock-lists/big-cap-20/">IBD Big Cap 20</a>. These screens are computer-generated, based on proven criteria rather than opinions.</p>
<p>The criteria comes from our extensive study of over 100 years of market history in which we identified the common characteristics winning stocks share in the early stages of a big move. With these screens, we highlight today's stocks that are most strongly showing those same telltale traits.</p>
<p>While you should never buy a stock just because it's on one of IBD's screens, these lists are an excellent starting point for building a high-quality, actionable watch list.</p>
<p>Be sure to regularly check <a href="https://www.investors.com/stock-lists/best-growth-stocks-buy-watch-ibd-stock-lists/">IBD Stock Lists Update</a> to see which companies just came on and off IBD's top screens.</p>
